nodes.text: Battlecruiser 17 was the callsign of a Munificent-class star frigate that served in the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, during the Battle of Ryloth, Battlecruiser 17 served as part of a fleet under Neimoidian Captain Mar Tuuk, as part of the Confederacy's blockade of the planet Ryloth. Prior to the arrival of Galactic Republic forces, the frigate was positioned elsewhere in preparation for a trap organized by Tuuk, but was later ordered into the Ryloth system by the Neimoidian, which forced the Republic forces to retreat out of the system.

Shortly after, a Republic starfighter squadron commanded by Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker's Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, made a second attack on the blockade. During the second attack, Battlecruiser 17 and the rest of the Separatist fleet were destroyed by Tano's squadron.

Battlecruiser 17 was a 825-meter long, 426-meter wide, 243-meter tall Munificent-class star frigate that was equipped with seven ion drive thrusters, a hyperdrive generator and two long-range hyperwave transceiver masts. Mounted at the vessel's prow were two heavy turbolaser cannons and two long-range heavy ion cannons, and it was additionally armed with thirty-four light turbolaser cannons, seventeen on the port side, and seventeen on the starboard side. Both the port and starboard sides of the hull featured the emblem of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

In 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Confederacy's droid armies invaded the planet Ryloth and established a blockade in orbit around the planet. The blockade comprised a Lucrehulk-class Battleship and six Munificent-class star frigates, including Battlecruiser 17, with the force commanded by Neimoidian Captain Mar Tuuk.

Later in 21 BBY, the Confederacy's blockade was contested by a Republic fleet commanded by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker. During the battle, the Republic's Blue Squadron, who had been dogfighting with the Separatists' Vulture-class droid starfighters, began an attack run on Tuuk's Lucrehulk-class Battleship. In response, the Neimoidian ordered Battlecruiser 17, Battlecruiser 19, and two other Munificents, which had been positioned elsewhere in preparation for a trap set by the blockade prior to the battle, to join him in the Ryloth system.

As Battlecruiser 17 and the other Munificents entered the system and reinforced the blockade, the Republic was caught off guard, which forced them to withdraw. While the Republic fled, the Separatist blockade was able to destroy the Venator-class Star Destroyer Redeemer.

Not long after, the Republic returned to Ryloth in a second assault on the blockade, resulting in the destruction of Tuuk's command ship. After the Lucrehulk's destruction, the Venator-class Star Destroyer Resolute emerged from hyperspace and launched their starfighter squadron led by Skywalker's Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, while Battlecruiser 17 and the remaining frigates fired on the Star Destroyer. As the Resolute took fire, Tano and her squadron were able to destroy all six Munificents, including Battlecruiser 17.
Battlecruiser 17 first appeared in "Storm Over Ryloth," the nineteenth episode of the first season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which aired on February 27, 2009.
